scripts.start: AGENTS=2 BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network
scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch:happ: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/word-condenser.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
